attributes.action: Suspend all visa requirements for Ukrainian refugees.
attributes.additional_details: Ukrainian citizens are fleeing their home country to the west. We urge you to follow Ireland, Poland and Hungary and to suspend visa requirements allowing refugees to flee to the UK.
attributes.background: We want the UK to play our part in helping Ukrainian citizens who have no other option but to flee the unlawful invasion of their country. Suspend all visa requirements for Ukrainian citizens entering the UK and allow refugees refuge in the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
